original_text: “Has the Lord spoken only through Moses?” they asked. “Hasn’t he also spoken through us?” And the Lord heard this.
korean_text: 그들이 이르되 여호와께서 모세와만 말씀하셨느냐 우리와도 말씀하지 아니하셨느냐 하매 여호와께서 이 말을 들으셨더라

sentences.original_text: Has the Lord spoken only through Moses?
Hasn't he also spoken through us?
sentences.korean_translation: 그분께서 또한 우리를 통해서도 말씀하지 않으셨습니까?
